options.content:
* Deployment = Vanilla k8s Deployment
* Activator = Always hook the activator in
* Queue = Only hook the activator in when scaled to zero.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency-min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 1000.0}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency-mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 1000.0}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency-p95")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 1000.0}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency-max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 / 1000.0}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "knative-serving")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving dataplane probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "activator-pod-count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

options.content:
* Zero = Only hook the activator in at zero
* Always = Always hook the activator in.
* 200 = Hook the activator in until we reach 200 concurrent requests

options.content:
* Activator Direct = Always hook the activator in: weightedExponential
* Activator Direct Lin = Always hook the activator in: linear
* Queue = Only hook the activator in when scaled to zero.

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Knative Serving reconciliation delay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Configuration" or r["_field"] == "Ingress" or r["_field"] == "PodAutoscaler" or r["_field"] == "Revision" or r["_field"] == "Route" or r["_field"] == "Service" or r["_field"] == "ServerlessService")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["BUILD_ID"] == "${buildid}" or "${buildid}" == "all" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["JOB_NAME"] == "${jobname}" or "${jobname}" == "all" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.description: The prow jobs name according to https://prow.knative.dev/?repo=knative%2Fserving&job=*perf*
list.label: Job name
list.name: jobname
